column1: Hi, welcome to P.F Chang's. How spicy would you like me to make your Chang sauce?
Ah, Mr. Cartman. We have your table waiting, sir.
Would you like to be seated?
Zis time, I will not drop zeh food.  Allo!
Welcome to Buca de Fagghecini for the authentico experience Italiano. My name is Roma. Can I start you out with some lotsa pasta macaroni minis?
